title: Vision Quest
description: You think I’m just another muscle-bound, sex-crazed, fuzzy-brained, futureless JOCK.But You’re Wrong.I dream big. I love hard. I think far. I act fast. I live humbly. I want to win.And, yeah, I’m a jock.My Vision. My Quest. My Life.The cult classic coming-of-age novel is back.
author: Terry Davis
